title: 10 in a Row: Mathieu van der Poel Grinds Rivals to Dust on Sandy Zonhoven Course
content:
World champion extends unbeaten streak as Nieuwenhuis, Sweeck and Ronhaar battle for podium in round 12 of UCI World Cup.

Read the full article at 10 in a Row: Mathieu van der Poel Grinds Rivals to Dust on Sandy Zonhoven Course on Velo.
author: sstokes
